description.@en: Dungeoneers are generally stout-hearted people, possessed of the will to do good and right wrongs. However, their heroism sometimes borders on insanity, driven by the predilection to destroy all that is foul below. Theyâ€™d make martyrs of themselves, if only to have their names spoken of in stories and song.

effect.@en: Immediately change your Order Alignment to Heroism and your Chaos Alignment to Martyrdom.
